rows.name: text_not_completed
rows.value:
As usual, you can access a new workshop tomorrow. It will help to complete the previous @global.workshop before then.  

Some parents are using the app while commuting to work. Why don’t you use the app when you have a few minutes? 

Thank you again for using @global.parent_app.

rows.name: text_completed
rows.value:
Congratulations, you completed the @local.workshop_data.in_text_title.

Tomorrow, a new @global.workshop is ready for you: you will see a big difference by making small changes!
